description:
After receiving the report from her staff, Anko senses that Orochimaru has snuck into the examination.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bushy Brow`s Pledge: Undying Love and Protection
Der Schwur der buschigen Augenbraue: Ewige Liebe und Schutz!

ผมจะปกป้องคุณไปจนตาย
